newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: One killed in bombing at Philippine funeral wake.
newsitem.headline: One killed in bombing at Philippine funeral wake.

text.p: One mourner was killed and 17 others injured when a drunken man threw a grenade into a house where a wake was being held on Negros island in the central Philippines, police said on Tuesday.
They said the man was apparently angered when the daughter of the deceased woman refused to allow him in the house on Sunday night after seeing he was carrying a bottle of liquour.
The man, a civilian recruited by the military for home defence, left but returned with a grenade which he threw at the mourners, killing the daughter and wounding the others.
The man fled and was being hunted by the police.
